properties.Name: CustomerSurveyQuestionResponse
properties.Description: The customer response to the survey question.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: SurveyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Survey.

Columns.Name: QuestionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Question.

Columns.Name: DateResponded
Columns.Description: The date of the response to the Survey Question.

Columns.Name: QuestionResponseText
Columns.Description:
A Customer response to the associated question that cannot be addressed by a simple Question Response Rating and requires some amount of text that must be individually interpreted.

An example is a statement made in response to a Question as opposed to a standard "Yes/No" or scaled rating.

Columns.Name: QuestionResponseRatingId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Question Response Rating.
